original_text: The other lamb you shall offer at twilight, and shall offer with it a grain offering and its drink offering, as in the morning, for a pleasing aroma, a food offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 한 어린 양은 저녁 때에 드리되 아침에 한 것처럼 소제와 전제를 그것과 함께 드려 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하여 여호와께 화제로 삼을지니

sentences.original_text: The other lamb you shall offer at twilight
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어린 양은 해 질 때에 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and shall offer with it a grain offering
a food offering to the Lord
